name: portfolio
description: Benjamin P. Haddon - Narrative, Systems, Psyche Portfolio

scripts.build: npm run update-cache-bust && npm run tailwind:build && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r src/public/* docs/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/js/project-descriptions.js docs/js/ && cp src/html/index.html docs/index.html && cp src/js/app.js docs/js/app.js
scripts.update-cache-bust: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const timestamp = Date.now(); let html = fs.readFileSync('src/html/index.html', 'utf8'); html = html.replace(/css\/output\.css\?v=[^\"]*/g, 'css/output.css?v=' + timestamp); html = html.replace(/js\/app\.js\?v=[^\"]*/g, 'js/app.js?v=' + timestamp); fs.writeFileSync('src/html/index.html', html); console.log('Cache busting updated with timestamp:', timestamp);"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready to deploy from docs/'

author: Benjamin P. Haddon
